title: Handkerchief, 1939
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer
description: Commemorative white handkerchief showing scenes in Yerba Buena, California; an old adobe home in Mission Dolores and depictions of ranch life. Souvenir of the Golden Gate International World's Fair, 1939.

tombstone.epitaph:

1939. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer. 1941-61-17.
